snippet: Pitchfork retracted a video interview with the rapper Chief Keef that was taped at a gun range after an outcry over his comments about the shooting death of another Chicago rapper.
abstract: Pitchfork retracted a video interview with the rapper Chief Keef that was taped at a gun range after an outcry over his comments about the shooting death of another Chicago rapper.

headline.main: Rap Rivalry and Twitter Outrage Lead Pitchfork to Pull Video
headline.print_headline: Pitchfork Issues Apology Over Rapper Interview
